body.head: Contact us
body.p: The funded stage of the Hofmeister XIX project has now ended. It may however be possible to correct minor errors on an occasional basis, and it is possible that there may be a further stage of funded development in the future. We will therefore be glad to receive reports of errors which will be logged for future action.

Both error reports and other enquiries should be directed to Nicholas Cook, Professor of Music, University of Cambridge (njc69 [at] cam.ac.uk). Please note that Hofmeister XIX is not the catalogue of a physical collection of music publications, nor a list of items for sale, and Professor Cook is not able to respond to questions about locating items in it. To locate copies of items included in it, we suggest you consult the Karlsruher Virtueller Katalog, or the list of international music libraries on the Royal Holloway Golden Pages.
